remarks: Linearity of subtraction through a group homomorphism.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Dec-2014.)
statement:
ghmsub.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
ghmsub.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` S ) $.
ghmsub.n $e |- N = ( -g ` T ) $.
ghmsub $p |- ( ( F e. ( S GrpHom T ) /\ U e. B /\ V e. B ) -> ( F ` ( U .- V ) ) = ( ( F ` U ) N ( F ` V ) ) ) $.
